<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns edit control text selection in format [start, length, selectedText]. 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value><tt>length</tt> could be negative if text selection is made from right to left. Use [[abs]] with <tt>length</tt> or [[count]] with <tt>selectedText</tt> if string length is required. <tt>start</tt> always indicates at what position in text selection is started. The cursor position will always be at the end of the selection. So if selection is made from right to left the cursor position will be at the left end of the selection. In order to find cursor position add <tt>start</tt> and <tt>length</tt> together (see example 3)</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[ctrlTextSelection]] control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] in format [start, length, selectedText] where:
* start: [[Number]] - position in text selection started
* length: [[Number]] - number of the highlighted characters (this number could be negative, see description)
* selectedText: [[String]] - selected text

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Selection is made from left to right:<code>[[ctrlTextSelection]] _control; //[0, 11, "Hello World"]</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Selection is made from right to left:<code>[[ctrlTextSelection]] _control; //[11, -11, "Hello World"]</code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Find cursor position:<code>[[ctrlTextSelection]] _control [[params]] ["_start", "_length"];
[[private]] _cursorPos = _start + _length;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlSetTextSelection]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
